longBusinessSummary: Repro India Limited provides printing solutions in India and internationally. The company offers value engineering, creative designing, pre-press, printing, post-press, knitting and assembly, warehousing, dispatch, database management, sourcing and procurement, localization, and web-based services. It also provides physical book distribution, print on demand, offset printing, and digital services. In addition, the company offers RAPPLES, a learning solution featuring a learning management system for students and teachers; and operates e-books store. It serves publishers, retailers, bookstores, libraries, and schools. Repro India Limited was founded in 1990 and is based in Mumbai, India.
